title: [BUG] libSkiaSharp not found MagicLeap2 (x84_64)
body:
### Description

Hi,

We are using skiasharp on XR devices. On Quest 3 (Android ARM64) it works well, but on the MagicLeap2 (Android x86_64) I have this error : 
```2024/01/22 10:12:39.836 1412 1448 Error Unity [10:12:39.834] ASTROLABE - GetPageAsync > Id=fc69227c-7984-493d-aa3f-8ed83838f6bb Exception=System.TypeInitializationException: The type initializer for 'SkiaSharp.SKData' threw an exception. ---> System.DllNotFoundException: Unable to load DLL 'libSkiaSharp'. Tried the load the following dynamic libraries: Unable to load dynamic library 'libSkiaSharp' because of 'Failed to open the requested dynamic library (0x06000000) dlerror() = dlopen failed: library "libSkiaSharp" not found```

But the lib **is** in the lib folder in the apk, and so should be found ?

Do you have any advice ? thanks

### Code

```
		AndroidJavaClass pdfRendererHelperClass = new AndroidJavaClass(_androidPdfRendererModule);
		byte[] bmp = pdfRendererHelperClass.CallStatic<byte[]>("GetDocumentBitmap", pdfRenderer, pageIndex);

		return SKBitmap.Decode(bmp);
```


### Expected Behavior

No error and the bitmap is decoded (same code works on ARM64)

### Actual Behavior

Error and no bmp is decoded

### Version of SkiaSharp

2.88.3 (Current)

### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp

Other (Please indicate in the description)

### IDE / Editor

Visual Studio (Windows)

### Platform / Operating System

Android

### Platform / Operating System Version

Android 10 (API 29) x86_64

### Devices

MagicLeap 2

### Relevant Screenshots

![image](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/assets/22128247/ace9e790-eb0c-4653-a775-bf0fe6dae7cc)


### Relevant Log Output

```shell
2024/01/22 10:12:39.836 1412 1448 Error Unity [10:12:39.834] ASTROLABE - GetPageAsync > Id=fc69227c-7984-493d-aa3f-8ed83838f6bb Exception=System.TypeInitializationException: The type initializer for 'SkiaSharp.SKData' threw an exception. ---> System.DllNotFoundException: Unable to load DLL 'libSkiaSharp'. Tried the load the following dynamic libraries: Unable to load dynamic library 'libSkiaSharp' because of 'Failed to open the requested dynamic library (0x06000000) dlerror() = dlopen failed: library "libSkiaSharp" not found
```
